name: Alien Ocean
description:
Arrow keys:   Up ,  down ,  left,  right

Shift:    Sprint

How is this uncharted:

1. I'm new to Game Dev, so I  had to learn  a lot  to work on this

2. This is the first solo game jam I have ever completed

3. I  learned how to use Unity's Timeline feature, Quaternion  rotation, and the A* Pathfinding

4. It involves a human navigating an alien ocean—with a color scheme that differs from theirs—to make their way out.

5. The player faces—simplified—"uncharted" aliens who may or may not lead the player in the right direction.
